import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class Homework2_task4 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		ChromeDriver driverChrome = new ChromeDriver();
		driverChrome.get("https://darwin.md/");
		driverChrome.manage().window().maximize();	

		
		driverChrome.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Promo")).click();
		
	Thread.sleep(5000);
		driverChrome.findElement(By.cssSelector("body > div.container > div.fixed-top-header > div > div > div > div > a")).click();
	Thread.sleep(5000);
		driverChrome.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Accesorii")).click();
	Thread.sleep(5000);
		driverChrome.findElement(By.cssSelector("body > div.container > div.fixed-top-header > div > div > div > div > a")).click();
	Thread.sleep(5000);
		driverChrome.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Experiența ta")).click();
	Thread.sleep(5000);
		driverChrome.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Magaz")).click();
	Thread.sleep(5000);
		driverChrome.findElement(By.className("menu-toggle")).click();
	Thread.sleep(5000);
		driverChrome.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Sport, sănătate")).click();
	}

}
